text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleCode where concept is-a _PersonalRelationshipRoleType

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleCode
    CodeDisplay
    _PersonalRelationshipRoleTypePersonalRelationshipRoleType

name: PersonalRelationshipRoleType
title: PersonalRelationshipRoleType
description:
Types of personal relationships between two living subjects.

*Example:*Parent, sibling, unrelated friend, neighbor
